thread.title: Joyce Honda's Wholesale Auction To The Public Is Happening Again
thread.title_full: Joyce Honda's Wholesale Auction To The Public Is Happening Again

title: Joyce Honda's Wholesale Auction To The Public Is Happening Again
text: Joyce Honda's Wholesale Auction To The Public Is Happening Again , 23 September 2015 -- 1888 PressRelease - Don't miss out on the incredible savings! Joyce Honda's Wholesale Auction to the public wont last long. Save the date! Drive home in the car of your dreams!Newark, NJ - It's happening again! Don't forget to mark your calendars for this Saturday September 26th, 2015! Joyce Honda will once again be rolling out its wholesale auction to the public! Get here early as registration will open at 11am, and the event will begin at 1pm sharp! A preview of the vehicles for sale will happen at the dealership prior to the 11am registration time, come by and see what we have to offer! Vehicle preview and pre approval will also be available on Wednesday September 23rd, 2015, come by early to get your pre-approval! Joyce Honda will have hundreds of vehicles to choose from! There will be a live auctioneer on site the day of the event. Don't have the cash to purchase a new vehicle? Let Joyce Honda handle the financing for you! We urge you not to miss out on this limited time engagement! Joyce Honda is located at; 3166 NJ-10, Denville, NJ 07834. Celebrating our 50th anniversary is not only a milestone, it is a testament to our dedication to our Denville and New Jersey customers who are looking for a Honda dealership they can count on for their sales and service needs. Our inventory is second to none because we know our customers have different needs when it comes to the Honda vehicle they want. Head over to Joyce Honda today! Joyce Honda is proud of our motto, "The Family Reputation You Can Trust," because when you are looking for a new Honda car, truck, or SUV, we will treat you like you are one of our own! We take the hassle out of negotiations by offering you low pricing and fantastic deals from the start because we want you to know we are as dependable and reliable as the vehicles we sell! You can visit us on the web any time at; http://www.joycehonda.com Joyce Honda - The family Reputation You Can Trust!
